group.name: Needle & Thread, Experiment at Brussels Atelier

description:
Making wool house plant cover by using old sweaters for cold winter. Cost: 3euro with material, if you can bring your old sweater would be awesome!
The technique doesn't require not much needle experience, althogh you can use needle if you want it.  Soon I try to put more photo as an example.
name: Making house plant cover by wool

group.name: Needle & Thread, Experiment at Brussels Atelier

description:
From Erin: I would like if we could try to make a skirt or a dress with inspiration from the 50's . So everyone bring their own fabric and get help with the planning and sewing. I do not know a locathion or a date, so I hope others can come with suggetions.

From Sumiko: organizing meetup cost small money so I charge paticipant for 2 euro. included drinks and extra materials such as ribbon etc from my atelier.
name: The 50's fashion

group.name: Needle & Thread, Experiment at Brussels Atelier

description:
Due to all unconvenience matter, the last meet up of "The 50's fashion" was not yet done!

Who wants to join the event?

Kristyna and I want to organize one more chance for "The 50's fashion"

5/03 Wednesday at my place? morning or evening even afternoon.

Or

04/03 can be only evening,

Or

06/03 can be  only evening.

Or any another suggestion? or another day of march, then I will prefer on Wednesday,

Please let me know your avaliable day,then we can arrenge the day!

Thank you
name: The 50's fashion

group.name: Needle & Thread, Experiment at Brussels Atelier

description: I organize 50's fashion for sharing your project and to develop people's interest; sewing, fashion and recycling! Please tell me, your schedule. I set the day 24/04 Thursday in this moment. It can be changed by your request. I can't meke it on Monday, one of my member can't join on Wednesday.
name: The 50's fashion

group.name: Needle & Thread, Experiment at Brussels Atelier

description:
colour in Fashion

Colours are definitely very influential on us and on others perception of us. in this meet up, we will discover the basics of each colour in order to nurture our ability and drive to realize our ideals for private and professional life!
We will discuss colours in relation to the work of trendsetter Edelkoort.
http://www.edelkoort.com
name: Colour in Fashion by Sylvia

group.name: Needle & Thread, Experiment at Brussels Atelier

description:
Let's fold or sew a piect of textile and put on the steam pan!

We can do it together is much more fun!

I have bunch of textile, so you can bring your textile material as well!
name: Steam technique for textile

group.name: Needle & Thread, Experiment at Brussels Atelier

description: Button's up, you can make it jewellry or interior accesory. This time, it costs only 4euro. included embroidary needle, thread and button. Let's have a fun! I've updated promo as below(you can not hear well but, the image is clear)https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tHEUt3xhOG8
name: Button's up

group.name: Needle & Thread, Experiment at Brussels Atelier

description:
I paticipate in Christmas Market at Montessori School in Tervuren. I sell my original craft kit and my craft for Christmas gifts & decolations. Please visit my shop Needle8Thread(Sumiko Yamaguchi)10:30-17:00

http://www.international-montessori.org/
how_to_find_us: Ask the info-person, where is Sumiko's booth.
name: Christmas Market at Montessori school 22/11
